definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Then the Indians put Owen in a canoe.
sentences.chinese: 然后，印地安人把他奉上一只划子。

sentences.english: This second trip fairly aroused the watchers along shore.
sentences.chinese: 小划子的第二趟行程可大大惊动了岸上的守望者。

sentences.english: It was insane to take the boat on the sea in that storm.
sentences.chinese: 那末大的风暴乘划子出海，的确是疯了。

sentences.english: He canoed the load across the bay.
sentences.chinese: 他用小划子把货物运过小海湾。

sentences.english: I run the canoe into a deep dent in the bank that I knowed about;
sentences.chinese: 我把小划子划到了我本来熟悉的一个深湾里去。

sentences.english: Grain used to canoed up the river.
sentences.chinese: 过去粮食用小划子运过河。

sentences.english: Grain used to be canoed up the river.
sentences.chinese: 过去粮食由小划子运送到河的上游。

sentences.english: Canoeing is a water sport practiced in small boats called canoes or kayaks.
sentences.chinese: 皮划艇是使用皮划子或小艇进行的水上运动。

sentences.english: We'll build a raft and sail on the Pacific Ocean, like Kon Tiki.
sentences.chinese: 咱们会造条划子飞行在承平洋上，就像康蒂基号同样。

sentences.english: I started up the Illinois shore in the canoe just after dark.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，我便坐划子前往伊利诺斯州的河岸那边。

definition: to scull (with a single oar, usually mounted on the stern of the boat)
